name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.namenode.name.cache.threshold
description:
Frequently accessed files that are accessed more times than this
    threshold are cached in the FSDirectory nameCache.

name: dfs.disk.balancer.block.tolerance.percent
description:
When a disk balancer copy operation is proceeding, the datanode is still
      active. So it might not be possible to move the exactly specified
      amount of data. So tolerance allows us to define a percentage which
      defines a good enough move.

name: dfs.mover.retry.max.attempts
description:
The maximum number of retries before the mover consider the
    move failed.

name: mapreduce.client.submit.file.replication
description:
The replication level for submitted job files.  This
  should be around the square root of the number of nodes.

name: io.seqfile.compress.blocksize
description:
The minimum block size for compression in block compressed
          SequenceFiles.
